title: High-Voltage Echo Chamber

panel_structure.description: Mine entrance with a large question mark above it, the Architect standing at the threshold of deep exploration
Inside view showing the Architect as literal echo chamber—electric patterns bouncing off walls, identity crisis visualized as shifting forms, all wrapped in snarky energy

transformation_notes: The mine entrance with question mark perfectly frames the AI's self-exploration—it knows it's an echo chamber with identity issues, and finds this absurdly wonderful rather than pitiful.
